title: SurfMarc
description: Get comprehensive product information, price history, and reviews all in one place. SurfMarc is a web application that helps users make informed purchase decisions by providing comprehensive product information, price tracking, and sentiment analysis.

title: AppliSense
description: AppliSense is a job application tracker for those who value statistics. Stay organized in your job search with my app! Effortlessly track job applications, monitor progress, and stay on top of your career opportunitiesâ€”all in one place.

title: CompCode
description: CompCode is a web application designed to help you prepare for coding interviews by solving commonly asked LeetCode problems from various popular companies. The app provides a user-friendly interface to browse, solve, and track your progress on these problems.

title: Linux Memory Allocator
description: Linux Memory Allocator is a multithreaded C++ memory allocator designed to provide advanced allocation strategies and optimized memory management. This project offers flexibility and efficiency for managing memory in C++ applications.

title: Linux Shell
description: A simple Linux shell written in C that accepts user commands and executes each command in a separate process, providing basic shell functionalities including process handling, internal commands, and a history feature.

title: SFU Hikers Hub
description: The SFU Hikers Hub is a centralized digital platform designed for the SFU Hiking Club. Its purpose is to enhance community engagement, facilitate the organization of events, and provide a dedicated space for members to share and find information about hiking trails, weather updates, and related activities.

title: Research Grant Council Database
description: A Database made for tracking grant competitions for research proposals. The system allows users to create, update, and delete grant competitions, proposals, and reviewers.

title: TempTalk
description: TempTalk is a web-based chat application that lets you chat with others without the headache of signing up. Make disposable chat rooms instantly and share the link with others to start chatting. TempTalk is designed to be simple, fast, and secure.

title: Database Schema Constructor
description: Database Schema Constructor is a web application for visually creating and manipulating database schemas and then exporting them as SQL Query files. Features include cloud saving, draggable tables for layout flexibility, and responsive design.

title: Quant Market Predictor
description: Quant Market Predictor is a Python-based tool designed to forecast future stock prices using historical market data from NASDAQ. Utilizing Linear Regression to make a Statistics Model, this project aims to provide users with insights into potential future market prices.

title: DrawAnt
description: DrawAnt is a simple drawing program designed for ease of use and versatility. With DrawAnt, you can create beautiful drawings with a variety of tools such as pencils, brushes, shapes, and text. You can also adjust the size, color, and opacity of your tools to create the perfect design.

title: ahmadmasud.com
description: My personal portfolio website built using React. The website showcases my projects, skills, and contact information. The website content is dynamically generated using JSON files, making it easy to update.

title: Sorting Visualizer
description: An desktop application to visualize the process of popular sorting algorithms. Implemented alogrithms include Bubble Sort, Selection Sort, Insertion Sort, Merge Sort, Quick Sort.
